subject: Attention Beneficiary,
body:
Attention Beneficiary,
I acknowledge receipt of your email so without wasting much time; I
have to  introduce myself to you this is last warning . I am U.s
citizen working under UPS COMPANY Permanent Representative of the USA
UPS WORKER for American as whole . We did received some letter from
FBI and Interpol office in USA here, that your Award beneficiaries,
that some so called claims coordinators has been extorting money from
beneficiary's before they will agree to sign the funds release and
make the funds available to you due, to that regards a meeting was
held on the 30th of OCTOBER 2023 to make sure that the files of your
package box are being looked into and also check out, And that was
when we actually found out that your package box contains the sum of
$12.7million  had not been deliver to your doorstep .
To that effect we the UPS COMPANY here in U.S NEW YORK decided to help
beneficiary's to deliver the sum of $12.7million to your home address
without wasting anytime,
 You don't have to pay any other charge/fees
apart from the courier bond charges here in USA
 , I want you to bear
in mind that we are only trying to help you because I believe that you
have been running with the wrong people for a longtime now and yet you
have not receive your package box and note that arrangement of this
consignment box  have been issue Us custom and FBI advice us to secure
all property in this Us UPS COMPANY ,
I also want to inform you that we have secure all documents to help
you receive your FUNDS PACKAGE BOX without any other delays, so you
don't have anything to worry about.
Once again the lists of package content are:
1. ORIGINAL COPY OF INSURANCE BOND
2. USA UPS COMPANY CHICAGO IL INVITATION LETTER
3. CERTIFICATE OF CLEAR SOURCE OF FUNDS ORIGIN (Issued by Internal
Revenue Board).
So to enable us dispatch your package via the above stated express
channels for delivery system kindly see below for the charges required
for delivery bond charge, therefore
 we urge you to make the payment of
$50 as soon as possible to avoid more increase of your delivery
charge
, which also serve as the courier charge, We are sending to you
details with which you are to make your payment with, for the delivery
charges of your parcel.Please note that all payment for delivery
should be made via (ANY GIFT CARD) AND your package to enable USA UPS
company New York deliver to you
I advise that you try your possible best to come up with the payment
as soon as possible today so that your parcel can leave for dispatch
before 12hours according to the agreement paper , Hope you understand?
And on the receipt of your payment confirmation email, your package
will be set for delivery which you will receive within 12hours.We
sincerely hope the above information is helpful to you, should you
have any further queries do not hesitate to write to us. Please make
sure you furnish us with your current delivery address to enable us
proceed because once they confirm from New York that the payment is
received we will deliver within 12hours from this New York.
Kindly get back to us and also with the requested information's, am
going to help you complete this transaction if you want us to proceed
on this matter with urgent don,t fail to send the courier bond charge
today.
Regards,
Mr. Miller Mitchell
Managing Director. UPS Express International New York
E-mail: 
pauyttggbfgg@gmail.com

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mr. Miller Mitchell,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern and willingness to help. I must admit, though, that I am a bit confused about the situation. Could you please provide more details about the award and why there have been delays in delivering it to my doorstep?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the courier bond charges. What exactly are they for? And could you explain why the payment needs to be made through a gift card? Is there any other method of payment available?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Carol
